Method to load persisted model
model._model_functions.load_retrain_model(path, filename, X_retrain, y_retrain, early_stopping_point=None)¶

Method to load and retrain persisted model :param path: path where the model is saved :param filename: filename of the model :param X_retrain: feature matrix for retraining :param y_retrain: target vector for retraining :param early_stopping_point: optional early stopping point relevant for some models :return: model instance

Parameters

  • path (str) –

  • filename (str) –

  • X_retrain (numpy.array) –

  • y_retrain (numpy.array) –

  • early_stopping_point (int) –

Return type

model._base_model.BaseModel
